productDescription:
Wear this Fanny pack as a crossbody bag for a nonchalant look or as a waist bag during your travels, shopping or a day at the beach.

The beautiful smooth black leather gives this minimalistic looking bag a special twist. This pack contains a spare pocket on the inside so you can keep your mobile phone, cards, keys and money safe. You can close the adjustable belt with 3 silver pins.

optionalInfo.fit:
Size: 30 cm x 12 cm x 9 cm
Length belt + bag: 78 - 115 cm
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We pack your order in plastic-free package material. Free shipping on all NL orders.
